question: Which Indian bank is set to launch an Artificial-Intelligence powered multilingual voice bot 'AXAA'?
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s leading private sector bank Axis Bank is set to launch a an Artificial-Intelligence powered multilingual voice bot 'AXAA'.
